    Description
    AbstractDemo
    Abstract base class for all JScience Demonstrations.

    Generic Launcher for JScience Applications and Demos.

    Provider interface for Demos and Applications.

    Service to dynamically discover JScience components (Apps, Demos, Viewers) using the modern ServiceLoader mechanism (SPI).
